title: *HOT* Kindle Unlimited Trial Membership Deal: 3 Free Months!
description: If you’ve been wanting to try Kindle Unlimited, don’t miss this Kindle Unlimited Trial Deal for 3 FREE months! It’s a great opportunity to score some fantastic reads on a budget. Prime members can currently sign up to get a FREE 3-month subscription to Kindle Unlimited! This is regularly $11.99/month so it’s a $35+ value!!Read More
author: Crystal Paine
